title: PERMABANNEd
body: I JUST GOT PERMABANNED. It says for malcious third party programs usage. BUT I HAVEN'T USED ANY KIND OF PROGRAMS. I'VE ONLY BEEN WITH MY FRIEND BUT I"VE SPENT OVER A YEAR ON THIS GAME. IS THERE ANY WAY TO GET MY ACCOUNT BACK?

replies.body: No. Don't script, you won't get banned.

replies.poster: x R e n g a R x
